item.title: Dillinger Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our dillinger container.
item.content: Due to a lack of upstream development, we have decided to deprecate our dillinger container.

item.title: Notification: Dillinger Rebase To Alpine
item.description: For operational reasons we will shortly be rebasing our Dillinger container to use our Alpine base image. Please note that due to a lack of available OS packages we are no longer able to provide a 32-bit arm image. The last image tag to support 32-bit arm will be v3.39.1-ls117. If you make use of any customization scripts which install additional packages these may need to be updated to use the Alpine packages and package manager (apk).
item.content: For operational reasons we will shortly be rebasing our Dillinger container to use our Alpine base image. Please note that due to a lack of available OS packages we are no longer able to provide a 32-bit arm image. The last image tag to support 32-bit arm will be v3.39.1-ls117. If you make use of any customization scripts which install additional packages these may need to be updated to use the Alpine packages and package manager (apk).

item.title: New Container: Dillinger
item.description: We have released a new container for Dillinger! Dillinger is a cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage, AngularJS powered HTML5 Markdown editor.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Dillinger!

Dillinger is a cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage, AngularJS powered HTML5 Markdown editor.
